issue.title: *** New SubT Simulation docker image available on DockerHub ***

content.raw:
Please remove it and then launch it docker image using the `run.bash` as shown below

```
$ rm -fv /tmp/.docker.xauth

$ wget #!/osrf/subt/raw/tunnel_circuit/docker/run.bash

$ ./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1
```
